Title: reinterpretAsUInt32
Description: Performs byte reinterpretation by treating the input value as a value of type UInt32. Unlike CAST, the function does not attempt to preserve the original value - if the target type is not able to represent the input type, the output is meaningless.
x: value to byte reinterpret as UInt32. (U)Int*, Float, Date, DateTime, UUID, String or FixedString.
Reinterpreted value x as UInt32. UInt32.
Examples: SELECT    toUInt16(257) AS x,    toTypeName(x),    reinterpretAsUInt32(x) AS res,    toTypeName(res)
